paragraphs: I took part in more than 10 projects, including landing pages with advanced animations and applications handling large data volumes. Using modern tools like Next.js, I developed innovative technical solutions and unique visual experiences.
I contributed to over 10 projects, building applications and landing pages optimized with React and Next.js. Improved SEO and performance, creating efficient and engaging digital experiences.
Built a solid foundation in programming and software design. Since then, I’ve applied that knowledge to develop modern interfaces and optimize user experiences.
